function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Underinvestment in healthcare systems","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread, overwhelmed healthcare facilities, and lack of resources for public health interventions","Mitigation":"Increase investment in healthcare infrastructure, improve access to medical resources, and prioritize public health initiatives","Technologies":"Telemedicine, healthcare data analytics, and medical supply chain management systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable communities","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, and international aid agencies"},{"Description":"Nationalism and populism fueling disunity","Impact":"Undermining international solidarity and cooperation, hindering global response to contagious diseases, and creating barriers to information sharing and resource distribution","Mitigation":"Encourage international collaboration, promote transparency in communication, and address disparities in resource allocation","Technologies":"Global health surveillance systems, information sharing platforms, and crisis communication tools","People":"World leaders, policymakers, and global health organizations","Owner":"International governing bodies, global health institutions, and diplomatic organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of global coordination and collaboration","Impact":"Fragmentation of global health efforts, unequal distribution of resources, and ineffective response to global health crises","Mitigation":"Establish international cooperation agreements, improve data-sharing mechanisms, and promote equitable resource allocation","Technologies":"Global health information systems, interoperable health data platforms, and collaborative research networks","People":"International aid agencies, global health organizations, and policymakers","Owner":"International coordinating bodies, global health institutions, and diplomatic organizations"}]}
